name: com.fuzzphyte.control
description: FP Control is a humble pattern that relies on the unity character controller to utilize a scriptable object to setup your 3D character controller - designed to be built around data.

samples.description: Please import this for all following other sample packages
Please make sure to import the 'Input Data Samples' first. Includes a demo scene, monobehaviour class that works with the Controller class, and a couple different scriptable object examples
